Name: team_size_limit
Description: A team must have between 3 and 9 members

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The duration of a sprint must be within a fixed range (e.g., 14-30 days)

Name: sprint_load_le_velocity
Description: Sum of story points in a sprint cannot exceed the team's velocity

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total cost of work cannot exceed the project budget

Name: worker_is_available
Description: A worker must have availability > 0 to be assigned work

Name: blocked_task_not_done
Description: A task with an active blocker cannot have status 'done'

Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: Every team must be assigned exactly one Scrum Master

Name: sprint_has_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a sprint goal

Name: valid_user_story_priority
Description: The priority of a user story must be between 1 and 100

Name: sprint_start_before_end
Description: The start date of a sprint must be before its end date

Name: task_effort_positive
Description: The effort for a task must be a positive value

Name: feature_has_priority
Description: Every feature should have a priority assigned
